name: OFFICIAL K-POP
description: Where K-POP fandom meets the global, digital movement. Fueled by the same passion that fills sold-out arenas... that lights up music charts worldwide... We’re harnessing that same energy to create a crypto cultural revolution! The Future of Global Pop Culture & Innovation The next evolution of pop culture fandom is here – a global, digital first movement that allows anyone, anywhere, to be part of Korean entertainment’s culture and identity. $KPOP is where global fandoms unite, and where artists, brands, and fans connect. We will redefine how fans engage, participate, and benefit from the culture they love. We’re building a digital gateway to exclusive experiences, global fandom, and ownership in the future of pop culture.
